sqlMap.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_NM , A.DPL_VER , A.DPL_DT , A.DPL_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.DPL_USR_ID, 1) DPL_USR_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE (A.DPL_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , '\n' ) AS DPL_DESC , A.DPL_STS_CD , SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00001', A.DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00003', A.DPL_TYPE_CD, '1') AS DPL_TYPE_NM , A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00004', A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD, '1') AS DPL_AUTO_AFTER_NM , A.DPL_AUTO_DTM , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(A.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM , A.DPL_RESTORE_CD , SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00005', A.DPL_RESTORE_CD, '1') AS DPL_RESTORE_NM , A.DPL_REVISION_NUM , B.SIGN_ID , B.SIGN_STS_CD , SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('REQ00004', B.SIGN_STS_CD, '1') AS SIGN_STS_NM , B.SIGN_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_USR_ID, 1) SIGN_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_USR_ID, 6) SIGN_USR_IMG , REGEXP_REPLACE (A.DPL_SIGN_TXT ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , '\n' ) AS DPL_SIGN_TXT , REGEXP_REPLACE (B.SIGN_TXT ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , '\n' ) AS SIGN_TXT , REGEXP_REPLACE (B.SIGN_REJECT_TXT ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , '\n' ) AS SIGN_REJECT_TXT , B.SIGN_DTM , B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 1) SIGN_REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 6) SIGN_REG_USR_IMG , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1000 A, DPL1200 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID(+) AND B.SIGN_DTM = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z IDX_PRJ_DPL_SIGN_DTM ) */ SIGN_DTM FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ORDER BY A.DPL_DT DESC, A.REG_DTM DESC ) A WHERE 1=1 UPPER(A.DPL_VER) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%' UPPER(A.DPL_NM) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%' A.DPL_USR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%' A.DPL_DESC LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%' A.DPL_STS_CD = #searchCd# A.DPL_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#

SELECT ROWNUM RN ,A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,F.DPL_REVISION_NUM ,A.JEN_ID ,B.JEN_NM ,B.JEN_URL ,B.JEN_USR_ID ,B.JEN_USR_TOK ,A.JOB_ID ,C.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,C.JOB_TOK ,C.JOB_TYPE_CD ,C.JOB_PARAMETER ,C.JOB_DESC ,SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00002', C.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS JOB_TYPE_NM ,A.JOB_START_ORD ,A.USE_CD ,SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') as USE_NM ,D.BLD_NUM ,D.BLD_RESULT ,D.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,D.BLD_SEQ ,E.BLD_NUM AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,E.BLD_RESULT AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,E.BLD_RESULT_MSG AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT_MSG ,E.BLD_SEQ AS BLD_RESTORE_SEQ ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1300 A LEFT JOIN JEN1000 B ON(A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID) LEFT JOIN JEN1100 C ON(C.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND C.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN DPL1400 D ON(D.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND D.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID AND D.JOB_ID = C.JOB_ID AND D.BLD_SEQ = SF_DPL1400_LAST_INFO(A.DPL_ID,A.JEN_ID,A.JOB_ID,'8')) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DPL1400 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1400 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = Y.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) E ON (E.DPL_ID = D.DPL_ID AND E.JEN_ID = D.JEN_ID AND E.JOB_ID = C.JOB_RESTORE_ID AND E.BLD_MAIN_NUM = D.BLD_NUM) INNER JOIN DPL1000 F ON ( A.DPL_ID = F.DPL_ID AND DPL_DEL_CD = '02') WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND C.USE_CD = '01'
AND UPPER( A.JOB_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.JOB_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND C.JOB_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY A.JOB_START_ORD
sqlMap.select:
/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1000DeployVerInfo - 배포 계획 단일 정보 가져오기 */ SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DPL_ID = #dplId#
/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1300DeployJobList - 배포 계획 배정 JOB 목록 가져오기 */
sqlMap.update: /* dpl1000DAO.deleteDpl100DeployVerInfo - 배포 계획 정보 삭제 */ UPDATE DPL1000 A SET A.DPL_DEL_CD = '01' WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#

/* dpl1000DAO.updateDpl1000DeployVerInfo - 배포 계획 정보 수정 */ UPDATE DPL1000 SET DPL_NM = #dplNm# , DPL_VER = #dplVer# , DPL_DT = #dplDt# , DPL_USR_ID = #dplUsrId# , DPL_DESC = #dplDesc# , DPL_STS_CD = #dplStsCd# , DPL_TYPE_CD = #dplTypeCd# , DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD= #dplAutoAfterCd# , DPL_AUTO_DTM = #dplAutoDtm# , DPL_RESTORE_CD = #dplRestoreCd# , DPL_SIGN_TXT = #dplSignTxt# , DPL_REVISION_NUM = #dplRevisionNum# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #regUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #regUsrIp#
WHERE 1=1 AND DPL_ID = #dplId#

/* dpl1000DAO.updateDpl1000DplStsCdInfo - 배포 계획 배포 상태 수정 */ UPDATE DPL1000 SET DPL_STS_CD = #dplStsCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
/* dpl1000DAO.updateRefReq4100Info - 배포 계획 정보 삭제 시 참조하고 있는 컬럼 정보 데이터 삭제 */ UPDATE REQ4100 SET DPL_ID = NULL WHERE DPL_ID = #dplId#
sqlMap.select: /*dpl1--]000DAO.selectDpl1000ExcelList 요구사항 엑셀목록을 조회한다.*/
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN , DPL_ID , DPL_NM , DPL_DT , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) DPL_USR_ID , DPL_DESC , DPL_STS_CD , SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00001', DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , DPL_VER , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) AS DPL_USR_NM
FROM DPL1000 A
A.DPL_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
A.DPL_VER LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
sqlMap.insert:
/* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1300DeployJobInfo - 배포 JOB 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1300 ( DPL_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,JOB_START_ORD ,USE_CD ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP
) VALUES ( #dplId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#jobStartOrd# ,'01' ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.select: /* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1400DplJobBuildInfo - 배포 계획에 배정된 JOB에 해당하는 배포 실행 이력 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,B.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,C.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG ,C.BLD_NUM AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,C.BLD_RESULT AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,C.BLD_RESULT_MSG AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT_MSG ,C.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG AS BLD_CONSOLE_RESTORE_LOG ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1400 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 B ON(B.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DPL1400 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1400 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = Y.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) C ON (C.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND C.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND C.JOB_ID = B.JOB_RESTORE_ID AND C.BLD_MAIN_NUM = A.BLD_NUM) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1400 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 )

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1400DplSelBuildInfoAjax - 배포 실행 이력 단건 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,B.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,A.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT_MSG ,'' AS BLD_CONSOLE_RESTORE_LOG ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1400 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 B ON(B.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = #bldSeq#
sqlMap.delete: /* dpl1000DAO.deleteDpl1300DplJobList - 배포계획에 등록된 Job 삭제 */ DELETE FROM DPL1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
sqlMap.select:
/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1000DplHistoryList - 배포 계획 실행,수정,결재 이력 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'BLD' AS TYPE , A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_SEQ , A.BLD_NUM , A.BLD_RESULT AS RESULT ,SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('DPL00002', Z.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS TYPE_NM , A.REG_DTM AS START_DTM , A.BLD_RESULT_MSG AS RESULT_MSG , A.REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 6) AS REG_USR_IMG FROM DPL1400 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 Z ON(Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# UNION ALL SELECT 'SIG' AS TYPE , B.DPL_ID , '' AS JEN_ID , B.SIGN_TXT AS JOB_ID , 0 AS BLD_SEQ , 0 AS BLD_NUM , B.SIGN_STS_CD AS RESULT , SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO('REQ00004', B.SIGN_STS_CD, '1') AS TYPE_NM , B.SIGN_DTM AS START_DTM , B.SIGN_REJECT_TXT AS RESULT_MSG , B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 6) AS REG_USR_IMG FROM DPL1200 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.DPL_ID = #dplId#
) C ORDER BY C.START_DTM DESC

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1400DplBldNumList - Job 빌드 목록 조회 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.DPL_ID ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1400 A JOIN ( SELECT Z.DPL_ID, Z.JEN_ID, Z.JOB_ID, Z.BLD_NUM,MAX(BLD_SEQ) AS MAX_BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Z.DPL_ID, Z.JEN_ID, Z.JOB_ID, Z.BLD_NUM ) B ON(A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID AND A.BLD_NUM = B.BLD_NUM AND A.BLD_SEQ = B.MAX_BLD_SEQ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_NUM > 0 AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# ORDER BY A.BLD_NUM DESC ) T1 ) T2 WHERE 1=1
AND RN <= 100 /* 100건까지 */

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1500NewChgId - 배포계획 수정이력 CHG_ID 구하기 (새로운 CHG_ID 따기)*/ SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(CHG_ID) AS NEW_CHG_ID FROM DPL1500 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
sqlMap.insert: /* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1500ModifyHistoryInfo - 배포계획 수정이력 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1500 A ( DPL_ID ,CHG_ID ,CHG_NUM ,CHG_TYPE_CD ,CHG_NM ,CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD ,CHG_COMMON_CD ,PRE_VAL ,CHG_VAL ,CHG_USR_ID ,CHG_DTM ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #dplId# ,#chgId# ,#chgNum# ,#chgTypeCd# ,#chgNm# ,#chgOptTypeCd# ,#chgCommonCd# ,#preVal# ,#chgVal# ,#chgUsrId# ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.select: /* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1500ModifyHistoryList - 배포계획 수정이력 목록 가져오기 */ SELECT 'MOD' AS TYPE , A.DPL_ID ,A.CHG_ID ,A.CHG_NUM ,A.CHG_TYPE_CD ,CASE A.CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD WHEN '04' THEN SF_REQ4100_REQ_INFO(A.CHG_NM,'1') ELSE A.CHG_NM END AS CHG_NM ,CASE A.CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD WHEN '02' THEN SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO(A.CHG_COMMON_CD, A.PRE_VAL,'1') WHEN '03' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.PRE_VAL,'1') WHEN '04' THEN A.CHG_NM ELSE A.PRE_VAL END AS PRE_VAL ,CASE A.CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD WHEN '02' THEN SF_CMM1000_COM_CD_INFO(A.CHG_COMMON_CD, A.CHG_VAL,'1') WHEN '03' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_VAL,'1') ELSE A.CHG_VAL END AS CHG_VAL ,A.CHG_USR_ID ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_USR_ID,'1') AS REG_USR_NM ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_USR_ID,'2') AS REG_USR_EMAIL ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_USR_ID,'6') AS REG_USR_IMG ,A.CHG_DTM ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP FROM DPL1500 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# ORDER BY A.CHG_ID DESC, A.CHG_NUM, A.CHG_DTM DESC

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1000AllDplList - 모든 배포계획 자동배포 목록 가져오기 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_NM , A.DPL_VER , A.DPL_DT , A.DPL_USR_ID , A.DPL_REVISION_NUM , A.DPL_DESC , A.DPL_STS_CD , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_DTM , A.DPL_RESTORE_CD , B.SIGN_ID , B.SIGN_STS_CD , B.SIGN_USR_ID , B.SIGN_TXT , B.SIGN_DTM , B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(A.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM FROM DPL1000 A, DPL1200 B, PRJ1000 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_STS_CD = '01' AND A.DPL_TYPE_CD = '01' AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' AND B.SIGN_STS_CD = '02' AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID(+) AND B.SIGN_DTM = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z IDX_PRJ_DPL_SIGN_DTM ) */ SIGN_DTM FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ST_DTM > SYSDATE ORDER BY A.DPL_ST_DTM
sqlMap.insert:
/* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1600DeployBuildChgLogInfo - 배포 실행 변경 정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1600 ( DPL_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,BLD_SEQ ,CHG_TIMESTAMP ,CHG_DATE ,CHG_MSG ,CHG_REVISION ,CHG_USER ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP
) VALUES ( #dplId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#bldSeq# ,#timestamp# ,#date# ,#msg# ,#revision# ,#user# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )

/* dpl1000DAO.insertDpl1600DeployBuildChgPathLogInfo - 배포 변경 파일 정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO DPL1700 ( DPL_ID ,JEN_ID ,JOB_ID ,BLD_SEQ ,CHG_REVISION ,EDIT_TYPE_CD ,FILE_PATH ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP
) VALUES ( #dplId# ,#jenId# ,#jobId# ,#bldSeq# ,#revision# ,#editTypeCd# ,#filePath# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.select: /* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1600SvnChangeLogsList - 배포 실행 변경 정보 목록 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_SEQ , A.CHG_REVISION , A.CHG_TIMESTAMP , A.CHG_DATE , A.CHG_MSG , A.CHG_USER , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1600 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = #bldSeq# ORDER BY A.CHG_REVISION DESC

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1700SvnChangePathList - 배포 변경 파일 목록 조회 */ SELECT A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_SEQ , A.CHG_REVISION , A.FILE_PATH , A.EDIT_TYPE_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1700 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = #bldSeq# ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC

/* dpl1000DAO.selectDpl1400DplNoneResultList - 완료되지않은 배포 실행 이력 조회 */ SELECT Z.DPL_ID ,Z.JEN_ID ,Z.JOB_ID ,Z.BLD_SEQ ,Z.BLD_NUM ,Z.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,Z.BLD_RESULT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM DPL1400 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1400 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.DPL_ID = Y.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.BLD_RESULT_CD IN ('01','02')
